review: We stayed at this place on our way to Dharchula. The rooms are are spacious nice, clean and hygenic. The staff is helpful and good. The food is good too. Everything is reasonable at this place and the hospitality is awesome.
name: Aakash K

review: It was really an amazing and everlasting experience. The hospitality and other services were also superb....food was splendid, Room is clean and good space....will look forward to another visit to this hotel....thanks
name: Manzar Khan

review: I have visited Pithoragarh with my friend overnight stay at Hotel Sangam in Pithoragarh . I enjoy valley view at night from my Premium room of Sangam Hotel . Rooms & Bathroom are quite clean &  nice local food cook by Mr. Lunthi Ji , he is very nice guy ,all the time he cares about his guests . Their is so many sightseen surrounding by Devdar Jungle .
name: vipinkausani
